name: Slime Shooters
description:
Modifications:

1. Changed colors of UI to match the theme.

2. Added Boss level.

3. Added Life Counter.

4. Added Powerups for Speed and fire rate.

5. All custom music created by me.

6. New Player Sprite

7. Added Objective and instructions in the pause menu for each level.

Bugs:

Level 2: The Crown game object does not lose health. Still working on a script for this.

Created by Jacob Alarcon.
